author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/rhel-4/subversion.spec : RHEL4 has a good BDB (4.2.52) so we
can build the BDB portion of Subversion on this distribution.

author: dws
msg: * STATUS : Add vote for backporting RPM changes.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/rhel-3/wbel3.apr.patch,
packages/rpm/rhel-4/wbel3.apr.patch : These files don't have anything to do
with WBEL3 specifically, so move these ...
* packages/rpm/rhel-3/apr.patch,
packages/rpm/rhel-4/apr.patch : ... to here.
packages/rpm/rhel-3/subversion.spec,
packages/rpm/rhel-4/subversion.spec : Track changes above.  Also turn on
testing in rhel-4/subversion.spec accidentally turned off in copy from
rhel-3 operation.

author: mbk
msg: Resolve issue 2281 by adding support for GNU date's iso-8601 output format.
I recognize that this is a step down a very slippery slope.  However,
considering that GNU date provides exactly the date format expressiveness
that r8327 removed, I think this move is justified.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/date.c:
(svn_parse_date): Add check for GNU date's iso-8601 output format.

author: kfogel
msg: * www/project_links.html: Add gna.org and opensvn.csie.org, both
thanks to Shlomi Fish.
